title: Galactic Designs.
content: Welcome to Galactic Designs! Our website is a hub for all things creative and visually stunning. We showcase the best designs from around the galaxy, featuring intricate patterns and bold colors that are sure to inspire. Our community of designers and artists come together to share their work and collaborate on new projects. Whether you're looking for inspiration or just appreciate beautiful design, Galactic Designs has something for everyone. Join us and explore the wonders of the universe through the lens of design.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a swirling galaxy, with bright colors and intricate patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
